name: Upton_Home_Kiffen_Storage_and_Display_Tower
description: This versatile Upton Home storage tower features a matte black finish and abundant storage for organizational bliss. Three adjustable shelves, a pull out drawer, and glass front curio provide flexible storage and display options while four cord management holes offer effortless media possibilities. Use this transitional storage unit in your den, bath, or dressing area to gain structure where you need it most. Upton Home, Traditional Furniture to Design Your Life.Materials: MDF, pine, 4mm tempered glassFinish: BlackTransitional styleNote: It is recommended to use top of tower for light, decorative items onlyVersatile curio tower design for media, extra storage, or displayFeatures three (3) adjustable shelves, one (1) fixed shelf, and one (1) drawerFour (4) cord control outlets (one per shelf)Anti-tip hardware for stabilityApprox. weight:  47 poundsSupports up to: 20 pounds (each shelf), 10 pounds (each drawer)Shelves: 19.5 inches wide x 13.25 inches deep x 8.5 inches high (adjust 1.75 inches up/down)Drawer: 7.75 inches high x 17.75 inches wide x 11.25 inches deepClearance: 4.75 inches high x 19.5 inches wide x 11.25 inches deepFootprint: 22.5 inches wide x 14.25 inches deepOverall: 52.5 inches high x 24 inches wide x 15 inches deepShelf Type: Curio, Display, Horizontal, Storage, Media CabinetsProduct Features: Adjustable ShelvingMaterial: MDF, Pine, GlassStyle: TransitionalAssembly: Assembly RequiredNumber of Shelf: 3Exact Color: BlackFinish: Black FinishColor: BlackStyleTransitionalMaterialGlass, MDF, PineFinishBlack FinishShelf TypeCurio, Display, Horizontal, Media Cabinets, StorageAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBlackNumber of Shelf3Product FeaturesAdjustable Shelving
